page.title: 16Wilkinson was a Chemistry Nobel Laureate
page.content:
Sir Geoffrey Wilkinson won his Nobel prize for Chemistry and not for Physics. Cockcroft won his prize for Physics: these two scientists were significantly different in age but they had the same science teacher as each other at the grammar school, apparently!

From Wikipedia: John Mitchell Nuttall, (1890 to 1958), was a Todmorden born physicist remembered for the Geiger-Nuttall law. John Ramsbottom, (1814 to 1897), was a mechanical engineer and inventor from the town.

Todmorden has two famous actors: Claire Benedict and Dicken Ashworth. Pianist Keith Emerson, (born 1944), was founder member of The Nice and Emerson, Lake & Palmer.

John Helical musician, was saxophonist in the band Supertramp. John Kettley, the former BBC weatherman, grew up in Todmorden.


Contribution by: todlad52
